document_data.name: Jilef Hillborn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jilef Hillborn''' was an individual that lived in [[Helm's Hold]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|No demonologist here! I suppose you don't become a [[wizard]] unless you're at least a little bit insane, but please, if you're going to investigate the infernal powers, do it well outside of our camp!}}
document_data.Activities: Jilef was a regular patron of the [[Old Dirty Dwarf]] inn. She was an outspoken critic of [[arcane magic]], and blamed [[spellcaster]]s for the rise of cult-activity in her city.
document_data.History: She was present in Helm's Hold when the city was taken over the Prophet [[Rohini]] and the [[Ashmadai]] in the late 1470s [[DR]].
